text: [Music]
what inspired you to create this device
basically the ideas came from I want to
communicate with my mom she's lived in
China she doesn't use any technology no
smartphone whatsoever and there's no way
that I can use any modern technology
committee with her so this where I come
up this idea that having a little
printer that doesn't connect to anything
except for Internet so I can print out a
message Sam her nose Sam her memo so
communicate with her the device can also
be used to prints out a words of the day
or little reminders but we already have
all the information we could ever want
on our phones so why print it out
there's occasions sometimes paper just
works better personal touch personal
feelings and and also this this one if
you set it up you can you can do a
reminder paper always harder to miss
right so how many times we forgot check
our messages we are you know got swamped
but this one it prints out is really
hard to move
